full_summary:
# 3Y004-230032(2) - Marine Vessel
## Tender Announcement

*Reference Number: WS3922987825-Doc4253067329*
*Solicitation Number: WS3922987825*
*Publication Date: 11 October 2023*
*Tender Closing Date: 23 November 2023, 14:00 ET*

### Tender Details
- **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements:** Various, including Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- **UNSPC Codes:**
  - 25110000 - Marine transport
  - 25111502 - Fishing boats
  - 25111506 - Tug boats
  - 72141200 - Marine construction services
  - 78101700 - Marine cargo transport

### Tender Description
Canada is seeking offers from offerors to provide the fabrication and supply of one 8.5 metre, rigid hull inflatable boat or a heavy gauge welded aluminum hull with foam filled and sealed floatation chambers with trailer and closed cabin on two outboard engines. The boat must comply with the Small Vessel Regulations (SOR/2010-91) and Transport Canada’s Construction Standards for Small Vessels (2010) - TP 1332.E. The tender closes on 23 November 2023 at 14:00 ET. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

### Contract Information
- **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contact Information:**
  - Name: Onwuama Ezechinedu, Nkechi (SPAC/PSPC)
  - Email: nkechi.onwuamaezechinedu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Accessing the Tender
The tender can be accessed through the Ariba Discovery platform at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17682602?extsite=MTc2ODI2MDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17682602?extsite=MTc2ODI2MDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5M
